text: “Korazin, nu chungroi arik bah na! Bethsaida, khom nu chungroi arik bah na! Nangnia sininkhêl sina omngei hah Tyre le Sidon'a lei sin nisenla chu, ma taka mingei han an nunsiena ngei renga an inhei minlangnân thoilapuon insilin ruvuta an inbuolna sôt atih zoi!11:21: Isa 23:1-18; Ezek 26:1—28:26; Joel 3:4-8; Amos 1:9-10; Zak 9:2-4
